title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: In the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled. Even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification", the build menu option still appears in the Java popup menus. This behavior is incorrect.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu should be disabled when the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences > Workbench settings.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open Eclipse in the Java perspective. 
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench. 
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification". 
4. Verify the options in the context-sensitive popup menu for Java files. The "Build" action should be disabled.
